p: The delayed diuresis onset with the HME and its EAF and CF may be ascribed due to the slow absorption properties of the responsible active ingredient(s). The long diuresis duration of action with the HME and its EAF and CF throughout the study period (until the 24thâ€‰hr) may be attributed due to the slow clearance properties of the responsible ingredient(s) [ 27, 28, 34].
